body: Yes, but I think you should ideally add a `#ifdef _OPENMP` as you have done in other parts of the code, as in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2764/files/d04868fc4aa3f0ff2530830c9ce3356b67b58318#diff-5fe5e0b57b11bc4d34842c432d2bdc35R96 for example
body_html: Yes, but I think you should ideally add a #ifdef _OPENMP as you have done in other parts of the code, as in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2764/files/d04868fc4aa3f0ff2530830c9ce3356b67b58318#diff-5fe5e0b57b11bc4d34842c432d2bdc35R96 for example
body_text: Yes, but I think you should ideally add a #ifdef _OPENMP as you have done in other parts of the code, as in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2764/files/d04868fc4aa3f0ff2530830c9ce3356b67b58318#diff-5fe5e0b57b11bc4d34842c432d2bdc35R96 for example
